thread.title: Best view of Manhattan from a great hotel - Review
thread.title_full: Best view of Manhattan from a great hotel - Review of Boro Hotel, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: lollyrichards
title: Best view of Manhattan from a great hotel - Review
text:
I stay in a lot of hotels and this place just rocked. Urban industrial chic with a fabulously comfortable bed and pillows it was a joy to put your head on. The area is definitely up and coming and we enjoyed our walk to the subway each day. It's so easy to drop into central manhatten and it's a safe neighbourhood.
We came for a long weekend to celebrate my daughters 21st and they accommodated my friends request for cake, flowers and prosecco in the room.
The balcony and window gave exceptional views on manhattan, no need for top of the rock!
Just loved it!
Room Tip: Pay extra for the manhattan view, it's worth it See more room tips
